aircraft.value: Hawk Defender - AC-8181-484 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Arming circuit safety interlock fault. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 17/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 20/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 22/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 20/09/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 25/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
